Here we relied on air temperature (and FLH) from global products (reanalysis and CMIP5) since a comparison with in-situ data from our AWS showed that these products very faithfully reproduce temperature conditions on QIC once a biasâ€“correction is applied, consistent with earlier studies
37, 54 . Hence while the application of free-tropospheric air temperature in our model did not require a more sophisticated statistical downscaling method
